attributes.action: include the study of ethical philosophy as part of the national curriculum in secondary schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present schools only provide a religious base for the understanding and development of morals for those in secondary education. This provides a very biased view that only religion may provide a moral basis and does not help those individuals who do not confrom to a religious doctrine develope their own moral framework.
